Title: Kali A Day #05 || masscan part 1
Description:
Kail A Day #05 || masscan part 1
Presented By Binary Brew Works

Another favorite. masscan can massively scan any number of IPs you want. Whether wanting to quickly find RDP on a local network, or on 0.0.0.0/0, masscan is the tool for you!
